messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Anyone in VA interested??
messages.msgSnippet: good idea!  anyone here on delmarva? s. ... peace, Susan Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek, but a means by which we arrive at that goal. --
messages.messageBody:
good idea! anyone here on delmarva?

s.

On Monday, November 11, 2002, at 08:40 AM, Puddinghead1@... wrote:

> I hope this is not in bad taste but I woudl like to get to know the
> folks
> near me who homeschool so I have formed a VA unschoolers egroup to
> subscribe
> send email to CentralVAUnschoolers-subscribe@yahoogroups.com . Welcome
> and
> Thanks! Lynn F




peace,
Susan

"Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek, but a means by which
we arrive at that goal."
-- Martin Luther King, Jr.
